description.narrative: (Democratic Republic of the Congo): .The USAID Solutions for Peace and Recovery (SPR) award develops and implements activities with local partners that build peace and stability in eastern Democratic Republic of the Congo. USAID will use FY 2018 resources to address the root causes of violence leading to political destabilization in eastern DRC. Main activities will include strengthening the capacity of women and marginalized group to participate in decision-making processes, linking women and marginalized groups to decision-making structures to ensure their inclusion in governance, working to change attitudes and norms for greater inclusion, but also expanding access to community and individual resources while improving social cohesion. The USAID Solutions for Peace and Recovery (SPR) is vital for building the foundation for durable peace in Eastern DRC, essential to achieve US Foreign Policy priority... .
